website_summaries.verdict: A soft, flexible and warm boot that tends to run small (only available in toddler sizes).
pros: Customers love that these boots are good quality, comfortable, and have a good fit for young children
They also stand out for their cute and reasonable price tag compared to some other brands
cons: A few felt they didn't last, and they tend to run small or that the opening is a bit too narrow
Like the other styles, this also needs waterproofing treatment

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughters after our first winter in Wisconsin. The last boots I had gotten them did nothing for keeping little feet warm. These do the trick! When the boots come off their toes are toasty warm. They can be stiff at first but they break in. My older daughter lives in her boots and so far they are holding up. I will buying them from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J. Robert

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's 1st pair of Bearpaw boots and we are in love!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size 2 because my daughter is a size 1 right now for summer and come winter she will fit in them perfectly. I always buy a size up in fuzzy boots. They are sturdy and worth every penny. If your child has skinny little legs like my daughter has they opening for the boots will look big on them.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra

customer_reviews.title: Run small and not a tall boot.
customer_reviews.text: First off the product I received was a regular short boot not a tall boot. I would have returned if we weren’t leaving for our ski vacation the next day. They did hold up in the snow and kept my little ones toes warm. They do run small. My 4 year old wears a size 9.5 and I had originally ordered a 10 and she could not wear them with a sock so I returned and got a size 11 which fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Trixi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Use to buy grandsons the fake uggs from costco and then the last two years costco switched to the fake uggs with buckles (for girls - but I won't even buy them for me - I don't like the buckles). Couldn't see paying the price for real uggs for a child who will out grow them quickly and plus uggs are made in China so not worth the high price. He really wanted fuzzy boots for xmas so I ordered these and he loves them, fit perfect, couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: yoga judy

customer_reviews.title: Better than I even hoped
customer_reviews.text: These are even better quality than I anticipated. Half the price of the competitor's brand and look great. My 9 year old loves them. We ordered a size up on purpose so she could wear big socks if necessary. They fit great with or without socks. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M. B. Josephson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Little Girls!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted boots like mommy, and she outgrew her baby Uggs that she was given for her first birthday, so I went searching for a new pair. I came across these and she said they would be perfect. I agreed and bought them. At first they were snug and hard for her to get on, just because they were so stiff from being new. But once we got them on and off a few times, she would wear them all the time. She would have worn them until they fell apart, but of course she outgrew them before that could happen. They are made well, priced reasonably, and are very comfortable and warm. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ylime85

customer_reviews.title: She found them very comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: The boots worked well for my daughter for about 3 months. She found them very comfortable and warm. However, they began to fall apart with the rubber sole tearing and the seams coming apart at the bottom and on the sides. I was hoping these shoes would last more than 3 months!
customer_reviews.author: Wordgazer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: The boot arrived in a timely fashion. Price was perfect!! Definitely the lowest in my search. Fit was perfect and color was as pictured in photo. The only thing that was confusing that the item advertises as a 6.5, you need to click and search for size that you need. My daughter was happy and as I ordered these a few months ago, it is now time for another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Vie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Quality isn't as good as I remember
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these boots each year for my daughter, spending the extra money over a store brand because of the durability. This year, they didn't hold up well at all - the stitching came up along the area where the leather meets the rubber. There was no exposure of her foot to the elements, but I still would have liked the shoes to last more than a couple months. That said, they're warm and comfy for cold climates, and easy to get on and off (especially for little ones). My advice is to size up just a bit to account for the shearling.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hirs

customer_reviews.title: Size up ..dtr LOVES these
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these! She wears a size 2 normally bit i ordered her a 3 and still had to exchange for a 4! Now they are perfect (she is weird about how things fit on her feet ..i am sure most kods could just size up 1 size!)
customer_reviews.author: JoMama

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and durable. My daughter is hard on shoes but theses seem to be holding up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy H

customer_reviews.title: For the price these boots are great, not a huge investment as our daughter will ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price these boots are great, not a huge investment as our daughter will grow out of them quickly. But they are a little bit on the small side, and restrictive when you are trying to get a foot through the top. We are cute wearing a 9&1/2 almost 10(toddler) an these seem small for a size 10. Over all they're cute and will keep her feet warm, I'm hoping they're good at keeping her feet dry too.
customer_reviews.author: ipdunn

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for the price! I actually have bought these two years in a row for my son since they look totally unisex. They are just like (if not better) than the uggs. I have uggs and I really think the wool inside the Bearpaw brand is fluffier and softer than mine. My son wears every day during the winter and when they get muddy I can just wipe them clean. Make sure you treat first with suede protector and they will definitely last all winter! Easy for him to run around and keeps his feet warm!!
customer_reviews.author: hrm11

customer_reviews.title: Better than UGG
customer_reviews.text: Loved these for my little boy. The leather is thicker and the wool thick and warm and the zip up feature is much appreciated for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Daydreamer1992

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get any better than Bearpaws.
customer_reviews.text: My kids can’t kill these boots no matter how hard they try. Not to mention, they absolutely love them. As long as they make them, I’ll buy them every year.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 7 year old for xmas. The glue has come apart from the sole and boots are now trash. Not happy about it since they cost 60 dollars and didnt even last 2 months. Was going to try and return them but not possible. Frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Good price too and worth it compared to the popular ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so cute and my daughter loves them. Good price too and worth it compared to the popular suede boots. I’m not going to spend over $100 on a 5 year old to wear boots.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult to put on
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get these in for my 2 year old. When opening them, I was very disappointed to find there was no zipper. Lack of zipper makes it impossible to put these on my daughters feet. I'll be sending them back. I shouldn't want to punch a hole in the wall out of frutration from trying to put shoes on my kid!
customer_reviews.author: C. Scan

customer_reviews.title: cute but snug
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who is currently a size 10. They are a little snug and considering he is growing I am afraid they won't fit by the time the snow and real cold arrives. So I am going to return them. They are OK for boys too though. I like them better than regular heavy snow boots my toddler can't walk it properly.
customer_reviews.author: SNY531

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots! Not tall as pictured, but we actually preferred shorter boots so it worked out well for us.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fits good and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my granddaughter she loves them says there soo soft and comfortable and warm her toes lol
customer_reviews.author: Francine Tucker

customer_reviews.title: the only thing that I didn't like about these boots was that it seems that the ...
customer_reviews.text: the only thing that I didn't like about these boots was that it seems that the stitching is already coming out of one of the boots and they have only been wore 3 times now. otherwise, they are very warm and she wears them mostly without socks
customer_reviews.author: Yeyo

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These boots were poor quality. My daughter wore them for about two months and the sole ripped away from the boots on both shoes. I would expect they would last more than a few months given what you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Katie E Pulnik

customer_reviews.title: Well made, durable and super cute!
customer_reviews.text: My son wears these slippers in the morning before getting dressed for the day. They are very well made, durable and my son loves that they look like mommy's. They do not provide a lot of arch support but he doesn't wear them long enough for that to be an issue. They are his favorite slippers and I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: My daughter wears a size kid's 12, but when ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears a size kid's 12, but when I received these size 12 boots, she could barely get her foot into them! Not sure why they are made the opening so narrow, but my very petite 6 year old couldn't even get her foot into the foot space
customer_reviews.author: Elaine D.

customer_reviews.title: We love these boots
customer_reviews.text: We love these boots! Great investment for the fall/winter. I will say that in my opinion they run a little big. My daughter is wearing a 9c in Nike right now and they’re starting to get snug so I ordered these boots in a 10. The 10 was WAY too big! I ended up sending them back for an 8 which fit perfectly. Make sure you check the size chart against your child’s foot measurement before you order :)
customer_reviews.author: SCLex422

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: These are just as good a uggs! I ordered a size 12 for my daughter who normally wears an 11 and there is room to grow but they are not too big for her to wear now. They are warm and perfect for this NY weather!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is a bit off. I ordered my daughters ...
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is a bit off. I ordered my daughters actual size, and it just didn't work. We could not get the boot on. Knowing there were free returns, I took the chance!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy P

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE BOOTS FOR MY TODDLER!!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased these boots at an amazing price. Notice that prices can fluctuate day-to-day on products here on Amazon. The week before I bought these, they were $39, the following week they were $29, so I jumped on them. anyway, these boots are EXCELLENT QUALITY!! I've never owned a pair of Uggs before, but I feel that since this supposedly uses the same materials, why wouldn't you just get these? My daughter has a wider foot than normal, and she can slip her feet in these with no problem. highly recommend this purchase. High quality materials and are super comfy and warm!
customer_reviews.author: oakmom

customer_reviews.title: I prefer my UGG boots
customer_reviews.text: Way too big. The quality seems nice though. I bought these to replace my UGGS this nasty winter, I wish I just would’ve bought another pair of UGGS.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great quailty a little snug. Just needed to go up one size.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. A little snug, had to return for the next size up. It was a difficult for her to get on. orginally ordered a 11 for my 5 yr old on her Birthday . Returned for a size 12. A much better fit.
customer_reviews.author: K.Derbs

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and comfortable, can wear all day.
customer_reviews.text: They are super warm and easy to slip on, which is so important during the winter mornings. I bought my oldest the same exact pair and hers are much taller than the size 7’s. If I had a complain that would be it, I wish the little ones were as tall as the size 13. Other than that nice boots, great grip and easy to water proof.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: they are very soft and comfortable. So I am keeping the 13 for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to order these in a size 1 when my daughter is a size 13. No big deal, they are very soft and comfortable. So I am keeping the 13 for my younger daughter to grow into. My older daughter cannot wait for the next pair to come in. Just remember to order them the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Jskirish

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My 6-year old wears between a 1 and 2, the size 2 fit her well with a small amount of room to grow. They are very good quality. She'll outgrow them in a season, so the price point is just right.
customer_reviews.author: K. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: These were ridiculously cheap and the girl KILLS boots/shoes like no one else. Sheepskin, pink leopard print - great for girls. Fits is good, warm for these cruddy winter days. Not waterproof, but I didn't expect them to be.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Soze

customer_reviews.title: A great Boot!!
customer_reviews.text: These are for my granddaughter as a gift. A little big for now, but she is only three so buy the cold weather they should fit fine. PS I have 5 pairs of bearpaw and like them more than my UGG's.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Kessel

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after two months
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was thrilled to receive these from Santa. However, after two months of wearing boots (a few times per week) the sole tire from shoe. It’s unfortunate they fell apart so quickly. Disappointed and probably won’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Feifs

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter Loves These Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are extremely comfortable per my daughter’s report. Made well and fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny J

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved these boots. They came in excellent shape. I did read a review to order a size up from the child's normal size and I did so I would recommend that for other customers. Bear paws are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Berthold

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my daughter she loved them and they kept nice & warm.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Bearpaw Emma
customer_reviews.text: These boots have steadily gotten more and more expensive. These are worth $30 but no more. My daughter likes them but has difficulty moving around in these. They have a narrow opening and the lining is somewhat skimpy.
customer_reviews.author: bobogold

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 4 year old daughter and she loves them. The full shearling lining is great and keeps her feet warm even without wearing socks and we live in Colorado so that's a great plus. I bought a pair for my 12 year old a year ago and she loves them too. Think I may be buying a pair for myself.
customer_reviews.author: dela820

customer_reviews.title: Bearpaws
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots and I have bought them the last three years for my grandson. They are half the price of Uggs and are just as good. He gets plenty of use and wears them almost daily. They last the entire winter and if his feet did not grow he could wear them into the next year. I would suggest these boots as an alternative to the more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were for my granddaughter. She completely wore out ...
customer_reviews.text: These were for my granddaughter. She completely wore out the last pair she had. She loves them and wears them every day!
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Latham

customer_reviews.title: Great Color .. goes with everything
customer_reviews.text: Great boots just as I expected .. we’ve been buying bear paws for years
customer_reviews.author: jlayne

customer_reviews.title: They are great for indoor and outdoor play
customer_reviews.text: These are for my 4 year old son. He calls them his cozy boots. He loves them and would sleep in them if I let him. They are great for indoor and outdoor play.
customer_reviews.author: Meggie Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: She loves them and wears them everywhere. This is our second pair purchased from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dot

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before purchasing so I ordered a size up, but it still was my good enough. It's impossible to get their feet through the tiny opening in the top! They are supee cute and good qualiry, just order two sizes bigger
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Delbosque

customer_reviews.title: Good service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this boot as a Christmas gift for my granddaughter. Her mom said she wears a size 11 but this boot did not fit. So possibly it runs small???? However it is a beautiful boot and we returned it with no problems and reordered a larger size. I am very pleased with the service I have received this far.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Young

customer_reviews.title: Terrific suede & REAL shearling for a great price!  Daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific, quality boot for a price much lower than other stores. Suede with REAL shearling-- lightning fast shipping! THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: AverageAmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Fall and Winter
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots they are too cute!! I must say to up the size because the extra fluff inside makes it seem smaller then it really is. My daughter wears a size 9 so I got a 10 and they fit perfect!! Defiantly will be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible boots!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible shoes!!!! My daughter had them 3 months and they are falling apart. Can’t get ahold of the company, and amazon won’t do anything. VERY VERY disappointed! Be careful and BEWARE!!! The boots will fall apart!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YASSSS !!
customer_reviews.text: The fit super nicely and they are reallllyyyy confortable!!! It’s exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.author: Melvina Black

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and warm
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased these boots for my 2 year old granddaughter in brown. They were so cute and warm I also purchased them in black. She loves them and they are so easy for her to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Erin D. Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Great quality boots for a child's fast growing feet. Bearpaw boots last longer than the no name boots without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were going to be tall boots. They are very low on the calf.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Seems like the opening was not wide enough to slide foot ...
customer_reviews.text: The size was right but my daughter struggled to get them on. Seems like the opening was not wide enough to slide foot all the way down and in. She was able to get one on, and it was great, but too much work for a slip on boot. Very disappointed as this was her go to footwear last year. May try another pair as I am hoping this was a fluke pair.
customer_reviews.author: Momof5

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Sole started coming off after only being worn for 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product. After a month and a ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product. After a month and a half the shoes have fallen apart. I'm giving 1 star only because it doesn't let me rate 0. I'm really angry at the situation, 40$ shoes from a well known brand, that didn't last the winter. And my girl was not active or doing sport with them.
customer_reviews.author: Vered kranz

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Look good and fit well. Good quality for the price. Only negative is the fur isn't quite as soft as Kirkland brand or Ugg, but still feels very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Also went a size higher based on other reviews and they fit great with room to grow
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 4 yo son and he loves them. Also went a size higher based on other reviews and they fit great with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Tatsanfran

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute boots but my daughter is saying they are a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, run on the small size
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, run on the small size. If you wear a 6.5 get a 7. Only thing is they get dirty fast so clean a cleaner and repellent.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Great for small children
customer_reviews.text: The look and fit are great! My granddaughter walks well in them and doesn't want to take them off. She is so proud of get pink boots.
customer_reviews.author: voracious reader

customer_reviews.title: Quality, warm boots for a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: Quality, warm boots for a fantastic price! The whole family owns a pair.
customer_reviews.author: BecMac2015

customer_reviews.title: Bearpaw boots
customer_reviews.text: Love, stunning boot.. runs a little small but I knew to order a size up from previous reviews..
customer_reviews.author: frny

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to put on and my daughter loves how warm they are. Will definitely buy another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy but didn't last
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these boots for comfort but unfortunately the sole separated after about only 3 weeks use. :(
customer_reviews.author: o_doubleu

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Warmth
customer_reviews.text: Love BearPaws-- These boots are great. Comfortable and warm and love the color. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Different style
customer_reviews.text: I was shipping a different boot . I was suppose to get the long boot but instead got the short one . . They are still cute and I will keep them just an FYI
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Valtierra

customer_reviews.title: These boots are very nice, just know that they are very narrow
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very nice, just know that they are very narrow. My 3 yr old has average width feet and they were too tight on her.
customer_reviews.author: C. DiPas

customer_reviews.title: remains clean looking and has worn well.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves them (and such a cold winter!) and they seem to be lasting. Everyone is happy with these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kanga

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots for my two year old son! He usually wears an 8, but I purchased a 9. They are a little big, but should fit well with thicker socks. I loved these boots so much, I even got myself a pair!
customer_reviews.author: js077

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, very soft and cozy inside. Daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love bearpaws, my daughter got those 3 winters in a row
customer_reviews.author: Nana Gasparyan

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. I was a bit disappointed because the lining is synthetic and not shearling like the adult boot. My daughter noticed they were not as soft as mine. They also get worn in the toe too easily for toddlers. After only a few wears the toe is scratched and does not look nice.
customer_reviews.author: T. Dumas

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This boot fit my daughter perfect. She is 2 years old and uses a size 8 shoe... the boot is true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Boots in used condition charged full price
customer_reviews.text: Boots were clearly worn, bottom of boots extremely dirty, daughter too excited to let me return them. Will not buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: KirbyChan

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, comfy boots I don't have to fight ...
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, comfy boots I don't have to fight with my 3 year old to put on. Can be worn without socks which is a plus too in our case!
customer_reviews.author: Andreacai

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: girls would wear these all day and to bed if they could
customer_reviews.author: #kevinkohnen

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy these boots. This is my daughters second pair and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: AG Shaves

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tight in the top. Hard to get on. Returned for a brand with toggle button.
customer_reviews.author: hannah hach

customer_reviews.title: I bought these boots for my little great grandaughter and she loves them Its hard to get ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for my little great grandaughter and she loves them Its hard to get her to take them off
customer_reviews.author: Joan Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Very good sturdy shoe for my neice
customer_reviews.text: Very good sturdy shoe for my neice. Ran a little small in size but had no problem shipping back and getting the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ornelas

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my four year old grand daughter. She wears them to preschool almost every day. The shoes are very well made. She can run and play in them, and they keep her feet warm. This is important because she doesn't like to wear socks. I love the "Bear Paw" tag on the boot, and the bear paw stamp on the bottom of the boot. It makes the shoes look like they are expensive "designer" shoes. The shoes also wipe clean very easily. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Nonny

customer_reviews.title: These fit fine the only complaint I have is that the zipper ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit fine the only complaint I have is that the zipper doesn't stay up.. I would recommend the slip on's..
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: lasted all winter
customer_reviews.text: this was a nice boot my little girl it fit perfect she loved them and they lasted all winter. The only thing about was the top rim started to shred but all around i would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Mama and Kids loved these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the grandchildren and they were a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Carlotta M.

customer_reviews.title: Love bearpaw
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots for myself and my daughter loved them as well
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Arellano

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Bearpaw Shearling Boots were well received. I don't think our little one has taken them off since they arrived. So-o Cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Lady J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter and they were perfect! Great material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best toddler boot and a great price point
customer_reviews.text: The boots are a perfect fit and keeps my daugher's feet warm even with thin socks. It's the best boots and you don't have to spend alot of money as some other brand charge. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Tray

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The boots are adorable. Make sure to weather proof them often. The color will run and transfer.
customer_reviews.author: Rnc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Just what i expected
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product ! Just what i expected.. I LOVE ❤️ shopping at AMAZON 🛍👢👍🏼....
customer_reviews.author: WPRM

customer_reviews.title: Bearpaw boots
customer_reviews.text: The boot was too small, but sending it back was not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, wrong size shipped
customer_reviews.text: I just got these a few minutes ago for my 3 year old daughter. It looks warm and made well enough. However, I ordered a size 10 and a size 9 was shipped. I'm disappointed in that as I hope to get it straightened out before we travel for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these
customer_reviews.text: Terrible that they don't have a zipper or opening. There's no way I can get this on my 22 month olds feet
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Chambers

customer_reviews.title: its her favorite color pink
customer_reviews.text: This was for my 6 year old daughter she loves it, its her favorite color pink. She has worn them few times now, she has not complained about this being uncomfortable. Like other reviewers i would recommend sizing up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: These look well built and sturdy - time will tell. Price was much better than the alternatives. the sole is slightly darker than the rest of the boot.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tusher

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money, Cute, Cute, Cute!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for both my 2 year old and my 17 month old girls, I have tried every boot out there from uggs, to the cheapies at Walmart and these by far are the best quality for the money comfy soft and warm and they are made to last for a bit. I will be buying these again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Busymom

product_meta.title: BEARPAW Kids' Emma Toddler-K
product_meta.description: This classic shearling boot from BEARPAW features a comfy fit and on-point style.
